about_the_game:
Phantom Hills is a first person detective game, developed by industry veterans from Duality Games. As the Paranormal Detective, Hudson Black, you explore an isolated town, trying to uncover the dark secrets of anomalies. Will you survive? Will you help, join or destroy the unknown forces? It is up to you, Detective.


Synopsis:

Mystery awaits in the surrounding forest of Phantom Hills. Some local legends say that an ancient creature has been living there since before humankind. Now, the fragile balance between the creature and the city is broken, putting the inhabitants in danger.



After losing his partner, Hudson Black quit the police force and started to study the supernatural. Two years later, now as a Paranormal Detective, Black is not retired yet. He helps the local police with solving “special cases” and clients who need help to deal with the paranormal.


Features:

  • True Detective Experience: collect clues, visit city locations, talk to people and analyze the cases while searching for a solution.
  • Use Ghost Hunter tools such as Digital Voice Recorder, EMF Detector, Motion Detector, Night Vision Camera and even an Ouija board.
  • Real Horror: Phantom Hill’s setting and characters are inspired by real paranormal cases from around the globe.

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes gore and violence.
